short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open current website on mobile device using QRCode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome to Device

Simple extension to open your current tab on the mobile device.

Open the tab -> click the extension icon -> scan QRCode using any QRCode scanner on your device.

Enjoy!
